title: Excellent app.
comment: Just need a fullscreen mode support, then I'll give max rate.

title: Inappropriate search results
comment: The results of my searches returned nothing that I was looking for. I compared the results to searching on Flickr on. My computer later, just in case there was just nothing there.  I searched for 1941 willys coupe for example, and with this app, 5 pages of all sorts of car that was NOT a Willy coupe appeared. Checking Flickr later, and there were plenty that it could have shown. I have no faith in this "paid" app they're touting, either.
Thanks for the feedback, however we are no longer maintaining this app. Please try the Pro version instead.

title: Very good
comment: In the absence of an official Flickr viewer for Android, this app makes a great job

title: Needs improvement
comment: Portrait mode would be nice. Also, I can't zoom in on my photos.

title: Clean and useful interface
comment: Tried other viewers but this one is the best so far, browse own photos, favourites, groups and contacts. UI is clean and professional.  Almost nothing to fault !

title: Good solution
comment: Needs a sideshow facility, but otherwise good.

title: Cannot save!?
comment: - and cannot browse sizes!?

title: Motorola xoom
comment: Does not display pictures in from of a slide show

title: Good Flickr app.
comment: Usually do not post reviews but this is a terrific app and I would love to see further development and updates.

title: Ok, but not everything works
comment: The app doesn't show all photos in all groups, and complains about errors for some.  It cannot set a favorite in spite of the menu option claiming to.  In general, I was getting an unhelpful error message (cannot do X or X failed) often as I tried to do things that I regularly do on my desktop system.  I had no problems authenticating.

title: Been waiting for this
comment: It's been a while since I got my tablet and I've found it problematic to view Flickr properly. This app seems to have the functionality that I've wanted. Not sure yet how well it supports review of Flickr groups

title: Amazing
comment: Amazing and simple interface. First day of use and I've already uninstalled all other flick tools. Only addition it needs is the ability to flick through pictures while viewing photos in fullscreen mode. Then it'll be a 5 star app.

title: Authentication not working
comment: Authentication still not working after trying all developer's suggestions - time/region settings etc.  Useless for me without. Uninstalled.

title: BRILL
comment: Official flickr app was not compatible with my galaxy 8.9, but this app is far better anyway! Many thanks for a great app. Bern UK.

title: Wonderful
comment: This is what Yahoo should have done. Thank you.

title: really good
comment: Would be 5 stars if there was a slideshow. Otherwise a really good flickr app.

title: Almost perfect
comment: It's almost perfect! The only problem is that it keeps turning to landscape view on my Galaxy Tab 10.1 which is frustrating, but overall the best tool out there!

title: Doesn't work
comment: I keep getting "received authentication challenge is null" when I try to log in

title: Great app. Only one issue...
comment: I've been using this app for many months now and it is really great. The only issue I have is that when I'm looking at someone's pictures (or my pictures even), I can only see the first page. When I try to go to the next one it tells me it's the last page.
The best tool for flicker with Android

title: Private groups
comment: Works fine except private groups appear not to be accessable.

title: Good
comment: Good app

title: Zoom
comment: When zooming in on a photo it would be nice if image fit the screen rather than be limited to the box, which is much smaller than the viewing space available

title: Very Promising
comment: Lacks ability to use the tablet in other orientations, and some groups refuse to load. But it runs very smoothly and has some excellent features.

title: Great so far
comment: It has an intuitive interface and it looks great. It would be even better if we could search for, add, and remove groups. It's the best flickr app for tablets so far.

title: Nicely done
comment: Well featured and stable. The only thing I keep missing is a full screen view for photos with the ability to flick through the stream/album sequentially.

title: Incredible
comment: This app is so great that I would even pay for it

title: Good
comment: It displays good on Honeycomb, but needs a little improvement to run smoothly... Tested on Asus TF101

title: Recommended
comment: The only thing I missed is forums

title: really grat  app
comment: the view full picture needs a little improvement   Thank you very much  Published by Galaxy Tab 10.1 with Honeycomb 3.1

title: Pretty good
comment: Best I have seen so far for plain browsing on a tablet.

title: Colin
comment: Great app! I was literally about to contact flickr on a tablet optimized app, but i came across this! thank you so much! and works with the Transformer(original)!

title: Nice but still requiring improvement
comment: Installed on a Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 with Honeycomb 3.1: it works well and pleasantly. It relatively efficient in using the available bandwidth, so loading time is fast. However its o ly a viewer and you can't upload photos.   It requires use in landscape mode only and doesn't allow rotating of the tablet.   Waiting for the next incarnation of the app!

title: Great app
comment: This is just a great flickr app. Smooth, fast, and easy to use.

title: Great app for Thrive
comment: Works really well on Toshiba Thrive. I was amazed I could upload photos, move them to new galleries, even see photos that were private to just me. Really a full-featured app.  I wish it had a slideshow feature. That would take this over-the-top for me.

title: Four
comment: Good app but needs a slideshow feature

title: Works Great on XOOM
comment: Thanks for the team for releasing update to fix the authorization problem, also make sure that the time on your XOOM is correct and the GMT Offset also is correct otherwise it wont authorize to Flicker

title: Great app
comment: Fantastic app and definitely would recommend it to anyone who uses Flickr on a regular basis. Very easy to use and certainly gives great results on my Transformer

title: Great App!
comment: I just downloaded this and it looks like an awesome app. Photo viewing is smooth and the layout is great on my Asus Transformer. I think the current features are great but I agree that that showing groups and recent activity would make the app even better, even if they were offered in a pay version. Great start to a useful app!

title: Amazing application
comment: This application is the best Flickr application for xoom! It's well designed.Everything works as you are expecting. Great job! Well done!

title: Awesome
comment: Amazing App!!! best ever, it does the job better than flickroid, the image quality is great, there are no ads, and it has everything to begin with. I love the fact that i can check the meta data of every photo, as well as the fact that i can check my contacts and favorites. Please add galleries, groups and recent activity from contacts, and this app will be beyond amazing... willing to pay more for extra features.

title: Great Start
comment: A great looking app for tablets that I really like. Only used for a short time but easy to use and a great way to show your flickr feeds.
